meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Nigeria.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny obo on the ground.
meanings.sent2: In Nigeria, you can buy many things with one obo.
meanings.sent3: The obo rolled away and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She saved every obo in a jar for a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The obo jingled in his pocket as he walked.

meanings.definition: A type of double-reed musical instrument.
meanings.sent1: The musician played a beautiful melody on the obo.
meanings.sent2: An obo requires skill and practice to play well.
meanings.sent3: The obo joined the flute and clarinet for a trio.
meanings.sent4: Her music soared like an obo in a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the obo echoed through the concert hall.
